subject: fix: add /pricing route to resolve 404 error
body:
- Created /pricing route with placeholder page explaining pricing calculator migration
- Updated svelte.config.js to use 404.html fallback for GitHub Pages SPA routing
- Added links to transaction structuring tool and legacy version
- Displayed planned pricing models (subscription, usage-based, per-seat, one-time, marketplace)
title: add /pricing route to resolve 404 error
